answers.answer: Hi, you join her way of eating and you both eat paleo / low carb / keto. This is, a healthier way of eating for everyone. Best way of eating is low carb,  moderate protein,  and higher unprocessed fats.

Hi there, It is so great that you are asking! It shows strong concern for your wife. We have found in our surveys of Sugar Sense app users that these are main concerns for them: how their family eats being unhealthy for them and feeling like they're making their family have to avoid foods they love. We don't have any information about it yet for users, but it is a topic we're addressing. Thank you for your post and your concern for your wife. Hopefully more members will respond with tips for you.

question: My wife is diabetic and I feel guilty when I eat things shes not suppose to eat. How do you deal with that?
title: How do I help family member with diabetes?
